forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming more intermittent for the afternoon. High 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then partly cloudy for the afternoon. High 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 41F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 49F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.
